Articles.Content:
Gets a 9000x9000x9000 speed cube. 

Inserts my head...

You can hear Max\_Creative's muffled scream inside the machine, then his corpse falls backwards, headless. Blood accumulates on the floor, flowing like a fountain out of the corpse's pulmonary vein. Inside the machine, you hear someone chewing, and an emaciated remnant of an eyeball falls out of the coin slot.

Inserts headless corpse. Poor guy inside the machine seems hungry.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-05-04T02:03:37Z" title="05/04/2016 02:03  AM" data-short="8 yr">May 4, 2016</time> by Matuchkin**

Gets arrested. What'll you tell the cops?

Inserts Gameboy

Get's fun forever! That thing is built to last, boi!

Inserts a thumbs-up

Gets TWO thumbs-up!

Inserts Neptune (god).

Recieves Poseidon.

Inserts slow avocado.

Gets fast avodcado! Duck!

Inserts Mjolnir

> 
> 
> 8 hours ago, EliasDanger said:
> 
> 
> Get's fun forever! That thing is built to last, boi!
> 

For the most part... I may have shattered one of mine into many pieces by leaving it in a backpack ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif ":blush:") It still works, there's just nothing holding the screen in place except a little ribbon of wire.

Gets Avengers.   

Inserts broken gameboy...

**Edited <time datetime="2016-05-04T11:21:48Z" title="05/04/2016 11:21  AM" data-short="8 yr">May 4, 2016</time> by Choctofliatrio2.0**
  
Sorry

Gets broken gameboy at 1000°K

Inserts a speaker.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-05-05T00:35:32Z" title="05/05/2016 12:35  AM" data-short="8 yr">May 5, 2016</time> by cubinator**

Get Jeb holding a megaphone. ( he was inside the speaker) 

inserts Jeb...

Gets Jeb trapped in a vending machine.

Inserts the Jaws of Life.

Gets the Dentures of Life.

Inserts coffee beans.

Gets ground coffee

inserts bill and bob

Gets Mystery Goo^TM^. ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif ":0.0:")

Inserts soup.

Gets fly and waiter.

Inserts [REDACTED].

Gets banned.

Inserts Voyager 2.

Get's V'ger 2! [http://memory-alpha.wikia.com/wiki/V'Ger](http://memory-alpha.wikia.com/wiki/V'Ger)

Inserts a virus.

Gets Ebola.

Inserts the book Lord of the Flies.

Gets traumatic childhood.

Inserts an unnecessary amount of achingly cute and ridiculously captioned cat pictures, taken with the free kitten received earlier. You get a cat picture, you get a cat picture, EVERYONE gets a cat picture! Or five!

**Edited <time datetime="2016-05-08T15:11:58Z" title="05/08/2016 03:11  PM" data-short="8 yr">May 8, 2016</time> by Streetwind**

Gets a picture of grumpy cat.

Inserts [spooky voice] ***the donkey of doom!*** [/spooky voice]

Gets... fresvacado?... 

Inserts a one dollar bill...

...Gets one cent.

Inserts Eve...

Vending machine turns into a black hole. So you get a black hole.

I insert potato

Gets fries.

Inserts sausage....carefully.

Gets grill.

Inserts locust.
